# Pairwise distances 
 
## RMSD_operator  {-}

Description: `RMSD` operator returns the Relative Mean Square Deviation of two variables. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/RMSD_operator 
 
## pairwise_RMSD_operator  {-}

Description: The `pairwise_RMSD` operator returns the Relative Mean Squared Deviation computed between pairs of variables. 

Link: https://github.com/tercen/pairwise_RMSD_operator
